programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: The Gold Rush
programme.desc: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a lone prospector goes through a series of misfortunes, including a blizzard and starvation. However, he finds love even in the stormy Alaska.

programme.title: Live - Mandira Bedi; The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Live - Mandira Bedi; The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: An archeology expert joins an Indian professor to look for a lost treasure of India. However, things take a dangerous turn when they are ambushed in their quest.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mothers boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: Booksmart
programme.desc: Two best friends decide to make up for all the fun they missed during their four years of high school on their graduation night.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: A man discovers that the woman he is dating is a superhero and decides to break up with her. However, things do not go as he planned when she uses her powers to turn his life into a nightmare.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Elizabeth Gilberts perfect world comes shattering down when she gets divorced. She then embarks on a journey across the world in an attempt to rediscover her true self.

programme.title: My Best Friends Wedding
programme.desc: When an old confidante of a woman reveals about his engagement, she sets off on a journey to sabotage his wedding after realising her love for him.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: To find her independence outside the White House, Samantha Mackenzie, daughter of the US President, leaves for college and falls in love with a student who is hiding a secret.

programme.title: Big Mommas House 2
programme.desc: Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent, reprises his disguise as a Southern grandmother and works as a nanny to unveil the culprits responsible for designing a deadly computer virus.

programme.title: Love Is in the Air
programme.desc: Antonie and Julie, past lovers, coincidently find themselves seated next to each other on a flight. As conversation ensues, past memories are revived, as they strive to understand each other again.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: Stars!
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: The Kid
programme.desc: After a woman abandons her child, the Tramp finds him and takes him under his wing. As the boy grows up, the Tramp and the boy try to cope with lifes trials and tribulations.

programme.title: Live - Mandira Bedi; The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Live - Mandira Bedi; The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: When his new neighbours extravagant Christmas decorations appear, a man feels challenged and initiates a spirited decorating competition.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: Ambitious about living the life of a cocktail waitress, a lap dancer tries her luck in Las Vegas. However, her life takes an unexpected turn after she falls in love with a sports gambler.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: Carpool
programme.desc: Daniel Miller has to take care of the carpool for his sons and the neighbourhood school children when his wife falls sick. However, in the course of the day, he finds himself a victim of a robbery.

programme.title: The Great Dictator
programme.desc: After suffering from memory loss, a soldier returns to his former profession as a barber and attempts to escape persecution by the military forces.

programme.title: Guess Who
programme.desc: Percy Jones, a proud African American man, gets the shock of his life when he learns that his daughter Theresas fiance is a Caucasian man.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: After a night of wild partying, two strangers awake and find they have married each other.

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: A family moves to a new neighbourhood with their adorable Great Dane, who is notorious for his inadvertent propensity to cause trouble.

programme.title: Marley and Me
programme.desc: A newlywed couples life transforms after adopting Marley, a mischievous dog whose antics bring joy. Subsequently, as they navigate parenthood with their babys arrival, Marley completes their family.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: A young girl hailing from an affluent family embarks on a quest for true love to dispel a curse that has pervaded her family.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.desc: A group of high-spirited youngsters led by Karthik and a band of senior citizens decide to resolve a property dispute by taking part in a car racing competition.

programme.title: DSP Dev
programme.desc: DSP Dev, a morally bankrupt police officer, undergoes a change of heart when the truth about his fathers death is slowly uncovered.

programme.title: Sohni Mahiwal
programme.desc: Mirza falls in love with Sohni, the daughter of a potter but their relationship is not accepted and he is thrown out of the village. Later, he starts meeting her disguised as a shepherd.

programme.desc: A family moves into a new home and experiences paranormal events. However, one by one, the family members start getting killed making the head of the family investigate the cause and stop the deaths.
